povexport
Class Sphere

java.lang.Object
  povexport.Sphere
Deprecated. processing-2.0 sphere OK? better just export as sphere primitive 

@Deprecated
public class Sphere
extends java.lang.Object

Provide an alternative sphere for use in processing that works much better than the original when exported to PovRAY, probably not required for processing-2.0
